## isNonNull() function

Test whether an argument is non-null

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNonNull<T>(arg: T | null): arg is T;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | T \| null | argument to test |

<b>Returns:</b>
